title: Number of snow sports ( skier/snowboard ) visits in the United States 2000 to 2019
yAxis: Number of skier visits in millions
summary: Overall Number of skier visits in millions has decreased over the Year.

Number of skier visits in millions is roughly constant from 09/10 to 10/11, slightly decreasing from 10/11 to 11/12, slightly increasing from 11/12 to 12/13, and finally roughly constant from 12/13 to 15/16.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 10/11 and 11/12.
Maximum Number of skier visits in millions, about 60.54 was reported at Year 10/11
Minimum Number of skier visits in millions about 50.97 was reached at Year 11/12
